Reimagine Every Room in Your Home

Your home should evolve with your lifestyle. At Custom Kitchens & Baths by Lopez, we specialize in transforming outdated interiors into beautiful, functional spaces that reflect your personal style and meet your family's changing needs.

Whether you're updating a single room or renovating your entire home, our expert team combines creative design with superior craftsmanship to deliver stunning transformations. From opening up floor plans to adding architectural details, we handle every aspect of your interior remodel.

With over 20 years serving Monmouth County families, we understand how to work with the unique characteristics of local homes – from Victorian-era classics in Red Bank to modern estates in Colts Neck.

Interior Remodeling FAQs

How much does interior remodeling cost?

Interior remodeling costs vary widely based on scope and finishes. Single room updates might range from $5,000-25,000, while whole-home renovations can range from $50,000-200,000+. We provide detailed quotes after understanding your specific goals and reviewing your space.

How long does an interior remodel take?

Timeline depends on project scope. Single room updates typically take 2-4 weeks, multiple rooms 6-10 weeks, and whole-home renovations 3-6 months. We provide realistic timelines and work efficiently to minimize disruption to your daily life.

Can I live in my home during interior remodeling?

Most clients remain in their homes during remodeling. We work room by room when possible, maintain clean job sites, and schedule work considerately. For extensive whole-home projects, temporary relocation might be more comfortable for 2-4 weeks during the most disruptive phases.

Do you provide design services?

Yes! Our design team helps you plan layouts, select materials, choose colors, and coordinate all design elements. We can work with your ideas or provide complete design solutions. 3D renderings help you visualize the finished space before construction begins.

What's included in your interior remodeling service?

Our comprehensive service includes design consultation, space planning, material selection, all construction work, electrical/plumbing updates as needed, painting, finish carpentry, and final cleanup. We handle permits and coordinate all subcontractors for a seamless experience.

Have more questions about interior remodeling?

Get Expert Advice
